articles.author: Megan Farokhmanesh
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 now has official modding support - The Verge
articles.description: CD Projekt Red has added modding tools and resources to Cyberpunk 2077 for players to adjust their experience. Although the tools are official resources from CD Projekt Red, players have been modding their experiences since the game’s release.
